title: Shandora - Unique Real Estate and Car Dealership Wordpress Theme
description:
Shandora is clean & flexible Real Estate WordPress Theme based on Foundation 4 framework. It suits for both complex and simple real estate property listings.

IDX Integration using dxIDXpress Plugin. Starting from Shandora version v1.0.1 already supporting IDX MLS Listing using dsIDXpress plugin. What you got for the listing from dsIDXpress plugin is not the default one but the extended one by the theme to fit the design. You can compare this with the other themes.

Fully Responsive . Build using Foundation 4 which is Mobile First CSS framework for responsive design.

Offset Navigation . Support offset navigation in mobile view.

Post formats . Support for post formats means you can jazz up your blog with your own video, images, galleries and of course good old standard posts.

Powerful Customizeable Search Panel This theme let you choose custom field to use in the search panel. Select up to 9 fields from 19 available options

Built-in Quiz Engine . Let you interact with your user by providing quiz engine feature for your user.

Built-in Polling System . Let you interact with your user by providing polling system feature for your user.

Built-in Page Builder. Shandora comes up with page builder features which will allow you to easily build your own page

Post Layouts . Support post layouts for pages / posts.

The theme also comes with a Live Support Chat Plugin.

This wordpress theme has been fully nulled, to install simply upload it to your host like you would any other wordpress theme.
